Author: DTCO
Title: ❤️ 🌏[ANN][Pre-ICO] IDGO - Isolated Communities are Migrating to Crypto! 🚀🚀
Body: Culture is now MINED! Cultural heritage bearers can now leverage their efforts with culture mining. IDGO allows culture miners (artists, traditional crop farmers, traditional architects, etc.) to issue their own tokens to be certified by their community. Culture mining is also linked to all the blockchain solutions within the IDGO ecosystem that allows isolated communities to move to an independant financial and governance system: self-sovereign identity, community cryptocurrencies & decentralized credit system.  Tokenomics With the public KINWA token directly pegged to all community currencies, the token holders can use KINWA directly in each community within IDGO ecosystem or keep the token as its value increase with the adoption of IDGO solutions.  WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | FACEBOOK | TELEGRAM ~~~~~ 20% Bonus during pre-sale until 21 of August ~~~~~ https://idgo.im/KINWA_onepager_EN.pdf

Author: onirecon2018
Title: ❤️ 🌏[ANN][Pre-ICO] IDGO - Isolated Communities are Migrating to Crypto! 🚀🚀
Body: The IDGO project aims to come up with a blockchain ecosystem that will be owned by them. The indigenous communities will be able to use this platform to maintain their freedom as well as rights. In order to make this a possibility, IDGO will be providing tools that can be used to build digital identities.

Author: kaido19
Title: ❤️ 🌏[ANN][Pre-ICO] IDGO - Isolated Communities are Migrating to Crypto! 🚀🚀
Body: IDGO will ensure isolated communities continue to maintain their existence and continue to develop into a wider world, because being a link between a traditional culture and crypto is very innovative, and this project is one that has the intelligence to do that well, I hope it can work well

Author: stoat
Title: ❤️ 🌏[ANN][Pre-ICO] IDGO - Isolated Communities are Migrating to Crypto! 🚀🚀
Body: Ok. this is a great project. The Kinwa token is an ERC20 but the actual coin is called TAOCOIN and there is a IOS wallet if you search "TaoPassport" on the app store.  the Taocoin runs on a private chain and the value is 1 TAOCOIN to 1 Taiwan Dollar, transactions are near instant and it is really being accepted at a few locations in Taipei and also all over Green Island which is an aboriginal island just off Taiwan. You can use it to pay for Hotels and food on the island which is mainly populated with aboriginal people from the Tao tribe. It's really an excellent example of how cryptocurrency can benefit local communities.  the block explorer for Taocoin is: https://explorer.idgo.im/token/0x9341EFcB186A16CcEF469313012c3D46d2A63751  you can see there are quite a few transactions per day
